definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The letter E is commonly used for electromotive force.
sentences.chinese: 通常用E这个字母表示电动势。

sentences.english: The measured values and the theoretical ones of electromotive force are very close, that is to say, the sensor is reliable.
sentences.chinese: 测试电动势与理论值十分相近，说明这种测头可靠。

sentences.english: Once the measurement connections are made, take care to avoid errors due to thermally generated potentials.
sentences.chinese: 连好电路以后，特别注意避免由热电动势引起的误差。

sentences.english: How do the induced electromotive force (emf) distribute in a conductor loop?
sentences.chinese: 导体回路中感应电动势是如何分布的？

sentences.english: The process whereby changes in the current flow in a circuit produce magnetism or an emf.
sentences.chinese: 电路中的电流变化产生磁力或电动势的过程。

sentences.english: Phase difference between the terminal voltage of an alternator and its electromotive force.
sentences.chinese: 交流电机的端电压和其电动势之间的相角差。

sentences.english: A coil of wire that moves in a magnetic field will have an electromotive force induced in it.
sentences.chinese: 当线圈在磁场中运动时，其内部会感应起一个电动势。

sentences.english: The other pair is formed of junctions of copper and the material whose Seebeck emf is to be determined.
sentences.chinese: 另一对是形成了铜路口及材料的塞贝克电动势。

sentences.english: Minimizing temperature gradients within the circuit also reduces thermoelectric EMFs.
sentences.chinese: 将电路中的温度梯度减至最小也可以降低热电动势。

sentences.english: The occurence of peak in EMF curve had also been analysed.
sentences.chinese: 同时还分析了电动势曲线产生峰值的原因。
